Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=90 µg/ml), Candida tropicalis (MIC=180 µg/ml), Colletotrichum lindemuthianum (MIC=90 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporium (MIC=90 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: The sequence displayed is only the N-terminal sequence of 7 kD peptide. The peptide was located in the cell wall, cell surface and nucleus of Fusarium oxysporum.

Literature.Title: An antifungal peptide from Coffea canephora seeds with sequence homology to glycine-rich proteins exerts membrane permeabilization and nuclear localization in fungi.
Literature.Reference: Biochim Biophys Acta. 2013 Mar 15.[Epub ahead of print]
Literature.Author: Zottich U, Da Cunha M, Carvalho AO, Dias GB, Casarin N, Vasconcelos IM, Gomes VM.
